rows.label: tev060201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Shinshin about the numbers on BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Shinshin if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Shinshin what the Nopon did during the attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Shinshin about the Ganglion's base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Shinshin about the battle with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Shinshin if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Something about big numbers inspires really uneasy
vibe, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0002
rows.name:
What if it is countdown to end of world?!
Maybe when it hit zero, Noponageddon begin and
forces of good and evil wage final epic battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Friends better hurry up, do jobs as Nopon bodyguards,
and eradicate evil from world before Noponageddon
happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0008
rows.name:
When holy disciples descend from heaven and sow
earth with many Nopon roots...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0009
rows.name:
That is when Divine Nopopon appear in Mira to
bestow great power upon Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Shinshin know this whole story by heart.
Nopon storytellers have been sharing it for generations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Shinshin believe that "holy disciples" must be human
friends! Friends descended from sky in big ship, mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0012
rows.name:
And "Nopon roots" must be talking about mighty
FrontierNav of friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Go forth, holy Nopon disciples! Sow Mira with plentiful
roots so Divine Nopopon will once again walk amongst
Nopon midst![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Shinshin pray with all of heart for Divine Nopopon
to stave off calamity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Then holy light emerge from body of Shinshin and
zap right through evil boss controlling army of giants![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Defeated, enemy army ran for hills like so many
bananaleaves in holy blender of awesome.
So to sum up, prayer of Shinshin saved city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0021
rows.name:
...Er, at least in dreams of Shinshin this was case.
Shinshin actually dozed off while hiding on ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0026
rows.name:
Shinshin hear that Ganglion has base in Cauldros.
What did friend hear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Legend says that Cauldros is place of beginning and
end. Alpha and omega. Anything can happen there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Friend should pay visit to Nopon named Lularita in
Cauldros. Look for Drongo Caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Lularita is exceptional warrior who knows harsh
continent backward and forward. Maybe she can be
alpha and omega of advice for friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Now that friend manage to defeat Ganglion,
Noponageddon has been averted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Of course, this all thanks to mystic powers of Shinshin
that provide support to human disciples of Nopon from
long-distance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Shinshin try to explain this to Lularita in Drongo
Caravan, but she just laugh and say "dream on."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG0037
rows.name:
But friend knows it is true, right? Friend was there on
front lines surging with mystic power sent there by
Shinshin, right? ...Meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG1001
rows.name:
Shinshin heard rumor that Divine Nopopon is coming
to New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG1002
rows.name:
Could Divine Nopopon want to welcome Shinshin into
inner circle? Turn Shinshin into Divine Shipopon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG1003
rows.name:
Shinshin already work many great wonders here on
Mira, so definitely worthy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG1004
rows.name:
But Shinshin cannot leave behind poor friends in
human flock. Friends still need power of Shinshin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev060201_MSG1005
rows.name:
So fear not, worthy Nopon disciple.
Shinshin will not abandon city.[ST:wait ]
